source.name: Lab 7.1 bot response location
source.instructions: **Where do you add or edit the exact text the bot can say (e.g. "Hello! How can I help?")?**
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify where bot response text is defined in the system architecture
source.guidance: The correct answer is level1/domain/basics.yml. Responses (the actual messages) are defined in the domain; flows in data/basics/ reference those responses. The domain file contains the exact text that the bot will say to users, while other files handle flow logic, configuration, and pattern matching.
